tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LoanPerformance (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  loan_start_date DATE,
  loan_end_date DATE,
  borrower_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE LoanPerformance (
  loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  borrower_name VARCHAR,
  loan_status VARCHAR,
  loan_start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LoanPerformance (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_id INT,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  loan_date DATE,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE LoanPerformance (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    borrower_name VARCHAR,
    loan_start_date DATE,
    loan_end_date DATE
);
